name: obsidian-sample-plugin
description: This is a sample plugin for Obsidian (https://obsidian.md)

scripts.build: tsc -noEmit -skipLibCheck && node esbuild.config.mjs production && cp manifest.json dist/manifest.json
scripts.devcopy: tsc -noEmit -skipLibCheck && node esbuild.config.mjs nowatch && cp manifest.json dist/manifest.json
scripts.version: node version-bump.mjs && git add manifest.json versions.json
